chapter.title: MIME types and data stream formats in &carrot;
chapter.para: &carrot; component descriptors used to include information about MIME types of the data streams accepted and produced by the component. This specification has been dropped because it was not used by any of the component writers. However, we retained the file format specifications even if they cannot be verified at runtime.
in this chapter. Please note that components may support other data formats, not necessarily restricted to the list below (which is apt to be extended or modified according to our needs anyway).
